• {{product.product_name}} - {{product.brands}} - {{product.quantity}}
    • import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ProduitService } from 'src/app/services/produit.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-quickcomponent', templateUrl: './quickcomponent.component.html', styleUrls: ['./quickcomponent.component.css'] }) export class QuickcomponentComponent implements OnInit{ products : any[] | undefined; data: any; constructor(private produitService: ProduitService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.produitService.getHomeData().subscribe(data => { console.log(data.products); this.products = data.products}); } }
